thread.title: Regent Street closed after suspicious item is found at Hamleys toy store | Metro News
thread.title_full: Regent Street closed after suspicious item is found at Hamleys toy store | Metro News

author: Richard Hartley-Parkinson For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Regent Street closed after suspicious item is found at Hamleys toy store | Metro News
text:
Richard Hartley-Parkinson for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 3:43 pm Police cordon outside hamleys if any news reporters want to get down here! pic.twitter.com/wKQtMTOZPH 
â€” Elizabeth Ammon (@legsidelizzy) February 15, 2017 
Regent Street was closed this afternoon after a suspicious item was found at Hamleys toy store. 
A large portion of the road in West London was shut off by police who put a cordon up in place while they investigated the situation. 
Met Police officers were called to the scene at around 3pm following the reports from people at the scene. 
Westminster Police later tweeted that a non-suspicious item had been recovered from the shop and the road was re-opened.
